{{velocity output="false"}} #macro (outputScript $code) <html> <body> <script type="text/javascript"> $!code </script> </body> </html> #end {{/velocity}}
{{velocity wiki="false"}} ## The following code replicates, as much as possible, the behavior of draw.io's OpenServlet. #set ($fileParamName = 'upfile') #set ($fileName = $xwiki.fileupload.getFileName($fileParamName)) #if ($xcontext.action != 'get') #stop #elseif ("$!xcontext.userReference" == '') ## Forbidden #set ($discard = $response.sendError(403, 'You are not allowed to perform this action.')) #elseif ("$!fileName" == '') ## Bad Request #set ($message = "The '$fileParamName' request parameter is missing. Either you didn't submit any file or the size of" + 'the submitted file exceeds the configured maximum upload size.') #set ($discard = $response.sendError(400, $message)) #else #set ($diagramContent = $xwiki.fileupload.getFileItemAsString($fileParamName)) #set ($format = $request.format) #if ("$!format" == '') #set ($format = 'html') #end #set ($xml = $services.diagram.importDiagram($diagramContent, $fileName)) #if ("$!xml" == '' && $xml != '') ## Unsupported diagram format. #set ($xml = $diagramContent) #end #if ($format == 'xml') #set ($discard = $response.setContentType('application/xml')) $xml #elseif ("$!xml" == '') #define($code) window.parent.showOpenAlert({ message: window.parent.mxResources.get('invalidOrMissingFile') }); #end #outputScript($code) #else #define($code) try { window.parent.setCurrentXml( decodeURIComponent('$escapetool.javascript($escapetool.url($xml))'), decodeURIComponent('$escapetool.javascript($escapetool.url($fileName))') ); } catch(e) { window.parent.showOpenAlert({ message: window.parent.mxResources.get('notAUtf8File') }); } #end #outputScript($code) #end #end {{/velocity}}
